ai-mil7.2.9:1.1_0: “Venerable Sister, what are the only one of these two factors?”
ai-mil7.2.9:1.2_0: “Great king, that fame came, with suspected and suspected.
ai-mil7.2.9:1.3_0: In the same way, a meditator is restrained in every way. ...
ai-mil7.2.9:1.4_0: this is the first to which the Community of nuns should be first to all.
ai-mil7.2.9:2.1_0: Furthermore, great king, when they see any kind of food, they eat whatever food they have been shaking at.
ai-mil7.2.9:2.2_0: In the same way, there are those who share without reservation any material possessions they have gained by legitimate means, even the food placed in the alms-bowl, using them in common with their ethical spiritual companions.
ai-mil7.2.9:2.3_0: this is the second great king, this is the second counsel.
ai-mil7.2.9:2.4_0: The senior monk who has heard the statement of the Teacher:
ai-mil7.2.9:3.4_0: and that’s where food I eat.’”
